name: Arelith Brawler Champion: Fighter 16/ Monk 4/ Divine Champion (CoT) 10
author: Mick Dagger

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
This epic champion fights with dangerous precision. He is unyielding and holds his ground. With intensive training and widespread combat experience, he adapts masterfully between different styles and weapons when faced with different opponents. He is strong and healthy, defends well against physical blows and is highly resistant to poison, disease, elemental damage and foul magic. With his sharp senses, he detects stalking cowards.

Strengths:
A wide range of combat modes: Improved disarm, Improved knockdown, Cleave, Expertise, Blind fight, Smite evil and Divine wrath (available if you buff charisma).
Epic weapon focus and specialization in both a slashing and a blunt weapon.
Extraordinary good saves and Evasion
High hitpoints, a very strong AB and a healthy AC
Easy to play from level 1-30

Weakness:
He is not a mage
SpoilerUnlike other builds I post , I have not been able to test this build by playing it from lvl 1 - 30 on Arelith. I normally test-play all my builds from lvl 1 and up before posting them. I have used the Arelith Wiki to find what changes from standard NWN there are to character creation on the PW and how that will affect this build.
